param.name: opensso_enabled
param.label: OpenSSO Enabled
param.description: Only enable this plugin once you're sure the following parameters are correct!

param.name: opensso_cookie_name
param.label: OpenSSO Cookie Name
param.description: This will be iPlanetDirectoryPro unless you've changed it in OpenSSO.

param.name: opensso_joomla_username_attribute
param.label: OpenSSO Joomla Username Attribute
param.description: The name of the OpenSSO profile attribute to use as the Joomla username. Use the default, uid, if users have the same username in Joomla and OpenSSO.
